raw_answer: 解:∵∠C=90°,∴∠CAB+∠CBA=90°,∵点P,D分别是AF,AB的中点,∴PD=\frac{1}{2}BF=4,PD∥BF,∴∠ADP=∠ABC,同理,DQ=\frac{1}{2}AE=6,∠ADQ=∠CAB,∴∠PDQ=∠ADP+∠ADQ=90°,由勾股定理得,PQ=√{P_{D}^{2}+9D^{2}}=2√{13},故选:A．
